title: Luxury House for Sale in Perera Mawatha [HS10]
details:
Under Construction - Completion In September 2018

A beautifully designed 3-storey house located 500 meters from the Pelawatte Junction, within close proximity to all modern day conveniences.

The property offers extensive living space along with five bedrooms and four bathrooms. The house features a spacious living & dining area, kitchen and kitchen yard, double garage, separate maids & driver’s quarters, rooftop terrace and landscaped gardens.

Ground Floor Plan
- Double-height living area and dining section which opens to the front and rear garden spaces.
- Guest bedroom & common washroom
- Separate kitchen and kitchen yard
- Enclosed parking space for 2 vehicles
- Separate maids and driver’s quarters

1st Floor Plan
- TV lobby with access to balcony terrace
- Master bedroom with walk-in closet, attached bathroom & private balcony terrace
- Two additional bedrooms with common washroom

2nd Floor Plan
- Bedroom with common washroom
- Lobby area
- Multiple expansive terrace sections [One of which is a timber deck]

Starting Price: LKR 60 Million Upwards
